transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi, good afternoon.
Customer: Hello, haanji sir.
Executive: Haan, good afternoon. Mera naam Shubham hai.
Customer: Ji sir. Maine meri firm Raf Furniture Interior Designer hai. Maine ek saal ka aapke aapka IndiaMART ka subscription liya tha.
Customer: Okay sir.
Customer: To maine actually mujhe yeh cheez bola gaya tha ki aapke paas jo bhi products hain aap usko daliye aapke paas business grow hoga. Maine consume ki mera maine 30 September ko purchase kiya tha. Ek week ke andar 10 din ke andar lagbhag mera bana. Maine buyleads vagera kuch try ki, kuch ki. Mujhe abhi tak koi business nahi mila hai. Unhone mujhe promise kiya tha ki ek mahine ke andar aapko jo itna aapne invest kiya paisa utna to aa hi jayega aur business aapka grow karega. Abhi tak aisa kuch hua nahi. Aaj tak mujhe ek bhi call receive aayi nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha aapko abhi matlab jab aap register ho rahe the IndiaMART pe tab aapko yeh sab commitment kiya gaya tha?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Ek minute sir, ek minute. Yeh call transfer hui hai Govind senior ke paas. Main Govind ka manager baat kar raha hu. Haanji sir bataiye dobara ek baar dobara explain karenge kya?
Customer: Haan, mujhe kya hua tha yeh sari cheeze jo jo maine aapko batai woh mujhe ek Surjan Lal ji hain unhone batai thi ki aise aise aap kar lijiye abhi offer chal raha hai sari cheeze hain.
Customer: Buyleads unhone kaha ki aayengi aapke products pe. Sir main na aapko ek cheez aapko batana chahunga ki aapko is services mein kya kya facility unhone diya tha jaise like aap MDC service use kar rahe hain aapko bola gaya hoga 17 leads milenge, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Aur jo aapko consume karna hoga daily basis mein teen char leads ke day basis mein. Uske baad direct inquiry aayegi aur direct calls aayega aisa unhone aapko bataya gaya hoga.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai? Itna hi to bataye honge sir aapko?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ab uske hisab se sir aap buylead bhi 11 buylead aapne consume kar liya. Nau buylead abhi tak aapne consume kiya pichle mahine mein aur same inquiry 17 inquiry receive hui hai October mahine mein aur same calls abhi tak nahi receive hui hai. Behalf of ki promotion ke basis mein dheere dheere aapko call bhi aana shuru ho jayega. Lekin abhi exact issue kya face kar rahe hain sir aur kya chahte hain aap woh bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Main yeh chahta hu ki mujhe yeh jo services hain aapki valuable nahi lag rahi hain. Baki main kisi aur ka bhi le raha hu main naam nahi unka lena chahunga. Woh kaafi mujhe helpful lag raha hai. Wahan se inquiries bhi aati hain, calls bhi aati hain, log bhi visit kar rahe hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: To aap kya chahte hain sir aapko matlab jo jo cheeze mujhe promise ki gayi thi.
Customer: Aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Did not receive any business or calls.

- Feels the services are not valuable.



Resolution:

- Explained about MDC service and buyleads.

- Mentioned 17 inquiries received in October.

- Said calls will start coming gradually.



Next Steps: 

- Asked the customer to explain the exact issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, mdc, calls
